attributes.action: block the extradition of Gary McKinnon to the US
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gary McKinnon is accused of hacking in to US military and NASA sites. He has Aspergers Syndrome. The Home Secretary has recently capitulated to US demands to have him extradited, despite evidence that this is causing him extreme distress and violating his human rights. He faces up to 10 years in prison.

rejection.details: We can not accept petitions about individual legal cases. The Home Secretary does not have general discretion in this case. He can only stop extradition if he finds that McKinnon’s human rights would be breached.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
